name: Tale of Stone
description:
A Dungeon Crawler game based on narrative and lore discovery, with multiple puzzles and challenges confronting the player !

Game developped in a week for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023

Controls : 

  • Keyboard and mouse :
    • AWSD/ZQSD for moving
    • QE/AE for turning
    • click or space to interact

Developpers :

  • Loïs Deniau
  • Vinet Guillaume

Graphic artist :

  • Poujois Quentin

Music composer :

  • Megollyen
